title: Katex
content:
KaTeX # KaTeX shortcode let you render math typesetting in markdown document. See KaTeX
Example # {{< katex [display] [class="text-center"] >}} f(x) = \int_{-\infty}^\infty\hat f(\xi)\,e^{2 \pi i \xi x}\,d\xi {{< /katex >}} \[f(x) = \int_{-\infty}^\infty\hat f(\xi)\,e^{2 \pi i \xi x}\,d\xi\] Display Mode Example # Here is some inline example: \(\pi(x)\) , rendered in the same line. And below is display example, having display: block \[f(x) = \int_{-\infty}^\infty\hat f(\xi)\,e^{2 \pi i \xi x}\,d\xi\] Text continues here.

title: Diagram
content:
Diagram # Diagram shortcode can be used as a way of displaying the images with caption.
{{< diagram "[path]" "css-class" >}} **Markdown content** Caption {{< /diagram >}} Example # Diagram with 50% w-50 float-end {{< diagram "diagram.jpeg" "w-50 float-end" >}} **Diagram with 50%** {{< /diagram >}}

title: Figure
content:
Figure # Figure shortcode can be used as a way of displaying the images with caption.
{{< figure "[path]" "css-class" >}} **Markdown content** Caption {{< /figure >}} Example # Figure with 50% {{< figure "figure.jpeg" "w-50 float-end" >}} **Figure with 50%** {{< /figure >}}

title: Mermaid
content:
Mermaid Chart # MermaidJS is library for generating svg charts and diagrams from text.
Override Mermaid Initialization Config
To override the initialization config for Mermaid, create a mermaid.json file in your assets folder!
Example # {{< mermaid [class="text-center"]>}} stateDiagram-v2 State1: The state with a note note right of State1 Important information! You can write notes. end note State1 --> State2 note left of State2 : This is the note to the left. {{< /mermaid >}} stateDiagram-v2 State1: The state with a note note right of State1 Important information! You can write notes. end note State1 --> State2 note left of State2 : This is the note to the left.
